mapper.select: SELECT oi.master_order_sn FROM order_distribute oi LEFT JOIN master_order_pay op ON oi.master_order_sn = op.master_order_sn WHERE 1=1 AND oi.source = 1 AND oi.order_type = 0 AND oi.order_status = 0 AND oi.pay_status = 0 AND oi.ship_status = 0 AND op.pay_status = 0 AND op.pay_id = 21 AND op.pay_time IS NULL AND DATE_ADD(oi.add_time, INTERVAL ${delay} MINUTE) < NOW() limit ${num}

SELECT oi.master_order_sn FROM master_order_info oi LEFT JOIN master_order_goods os ON oi.master_order_sn=os.master_order_sn WHERE 1=1 AND oi.channel_code = #{siteCode ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND oi.trans_type=1 AND oi.order_status <> 2 AND oi.pay_status=0 AND oi.lock_status=0 AND oi.surplus<=0.00 AND oi.add_time<DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL ${delay} MINUTE) AND oi.add_time> DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 3 HOUR) AND os.send_number > 0 ORDER BY oi.master_order_sn ASC LIMIT ${num}

SELECT oi.master_order_sn FROM master_order_info oi WHERE 1=1 AND oi.lock_status = 10000 AND oi.lock_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) AND oi.add_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 DAY) AND oi.add_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) LIMIT ${num}

SELECT oi.master_order_sn FROM master_order_info oi WHERE 1=1 AND oi.add_time <= (DATE(NOW()) - INTERVAL ${delay} MONTH) AND (oi.order_status > 1 OR (oi.source = 1 AND oi.order_status = '1' AND oi.pay_status = '2' AND oi.ship_status = '3')) LIMIT ${num}

SELECT oi.master_order_sn FROM order_depot_ship os LEFT JOIN order_distribute od ON os.order_sn = od.order_sn LEFT JOIN master_order_info oi ON oi.master_order_sn = od.master_order_sn WHERE oi.order_status NOT IN (2, 3) AND oi.question_status = 0 AND oi.ship_status = 3 AND oi.pay_status = 3 AND os.delivery_time IS NOT NULL AND os.delivery_time < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -${delay} DAY) AND os.delivery_time > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -${delay}-1 DAY) LIMIT ${num}

SELECT oi.master_order_sn FROM master_order_info AS oi LEFT JOIN master_order_info_extend oie ON oi.master_order_sn = oie.master_order_sn INNER JOIN master_order_pay AS op ON oi.master_order_sn = op.master_order_sn WHERE 1=1
AND oi.order_type = 0 AND (oie.is_group IS NULL OR (oie.is_group IS NOT NULL AND oie.is_group <> '1')) AND oi.trans_type <> 2 AND oi.question_status = 0 AND oi.order_status = 0 AND oi.pay_status in(0,1) AND oi.ship_status = 0 AND op.pay_status = 0 AND op.pay_id != 4 AND op.pay_time IS NULL AND op.pay_lasttime <= now() AND oi.lock_status = 0 LIMIT ${num}

SELECT oi.master_order_sn FROM master_order_info_extend oie INNER JOIN master_order_info oi ON oi.master_order_sn = oie.master_order_sn AND oie.is_group = 1 INNER JOIN master_order_goods og ON oi.master_order_sn = og.master_order_sn WHERE 1=1
AND oi.lock_status = 0 AND oi.ship_status = 0 AND oi.pay_status = 0 AND oi.order_status = '0' AND oi.add_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AND oi.add_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 35 MINUTE) LIMIT ${num}

SELECT oi.master_order_sn FROM master_order_info oi LEFT JOIN master_order_action action ON oi.master_order_sn = action.master_order_sn WHERE oi.add_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND oi.add_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND oi.order_status = 0 AND oi.pay_status = 0 AND oi.goods_count = 0 AND action.action_note LIKE '通过复制订单生成订单%' limit ${start},${limit}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM master_order_info oi LEFT JOIN master_order_action action ON oi.master_order_sn = action.master_order_sn WHERE oi.add_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND oi.add_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND oi.order_status = 0 AND oi.pay_status = 0 AND oi.goods_count = 0 AND action.action_note LIKE '通过复制订单生成订单%'

SELECT oi.order_sn FROM order_distribute oi LEFT JOIN master_order_info moi ON moi.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn WHERE oi.order_status = 1 AND moi.pay_status = 2 AND oi.ship_status IN (0,2) AND oi.add_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND oi.add_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND oi.question_status = 0 AND oi.last_update_time != '' AND oi.last_update_time IS NOT NULL limit ${start},${limit}

SELECT count(1) FROM order_distribute oi LEFT JOIN master_order_info moi ON moi.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn WHERE oi.order_status = 1 AND moi.pay_status = 2 AND oi.ship_status IN (0,2) AND oi.add_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND oi.add_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND oi.question_status = 0 AND oi.last_update_time != '' AND oi.last_update_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT order_sn FROM order_distribute oi WHERE oi.order_status = 1 AND oi.ship_status = 0 AND oi.add_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) AND oi.add_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AND oi.question_status = 0 AND (oi.last_update_time = '' OR oi.last_update_time IS NULL) LIMIT ${num}

SELECT oi.order_sn AS "orderSn", oi.order_from AS "channelCode", oa.consignee, oa.tel AS "recTel" , oa.mobile AS "recMobile" , oa.province AS "provinceId", oa.city AS "cityId", oa.district AS "districtId", oa.address AS "recAddress" , oa.zipcode AS "recZipcode", os.invoice_no AS "invoiceNo" , os.shipping_id AS "companyId" , os.depot_code AS "depotCode" FROM order_depot_ship os LEFT JOIN task_shop_express task ON os.order_sn = task.order_sn AND task.is_ok = '1' AND task.shipping_id = #{companyId} LEFT JOIN order_distribute oi ON os.order_sn = oi.order_sn LEFT JOIN master_order_address_info oa ON oi.master_order_sn = oa.master_order_sn WHERE task.id IS NULL AND oi.add_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND oi.order_status NOT IN ('2','3') AND oi.ship_status > 2 AND os.shipping_id = #{companyId} AND os.delivery_time >= #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} >= os.delivery_time AND os.invoice_no != '' LIMIT ${num}

SELECT oi.order_sn AS "orderSn", oi.order_from AS "channelCode", oa.consignee, oa.tel AS "recTel" , oa.mobile AS "recMobile" , oa.province AS "provinceId", oa.city AS "cityId", oa.district AS "districtId", oa.address AS "recAddress" , oa.zipcode AS "recZipcode", os.invoice_no AS "invoiceNo" , os.shipping_id AS "companyId" , os.depot_code AS "depotCode" FROM order_depot_ship os LEFT JOIN task_shop_express task ON os.order_sn = task.order_sn AND task.is_ok = '1' AND task.depot_code = os.depot_code AND task.shipping_id = #{companyId} LEFT JOIN order_distribute oi ON os.order_sn = oi.order_sn LEFT JOIN master_order_address_info oa ON oi.master_order_sn = oa.master_order_sn WHERE 1=1 AND task.id IS NULL AND oi.order_status NOT IN ('2','3') AND oi.ship_status > 2 AND os.shipping_id = #{companyId} AND LEFT(os.depot_code,2) = 'A0' AND oi.add_time >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND os.delivery_time >= #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} >= os.delivery_time AND os.invoice_no != '' LIMIT ${num}

INSERT INTO
master_order_action
master_order_action_history
( master_order_sn, action_user, order_status, shipping_status, pay_status, action_note, log_time )( SELECT oih.order_sn, oih.action_user, oih.order_status, oih.shipping_status, oih.pay_status, oih.action_note, oih.log_time FROM
order_action AS oih
order_action_history AS oih
WHERE oih.order_sn = #{orderSn ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} );

SELECT moi.master_order_sn masterOrderSn, moie.shop_code storeCode FROM master_order_info moi, master_order_info_extend moie, order_distribute oi WHERE moi.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn AND moi.master_order_sn = moie.master_order_sn AND moi.order_status = 1 AND moi.pay_status = 2 AND moi.ship_status = 0 AND moie.is_cac = 1 AND moi.add_time >= CAST((CAST(SYSDATE()AS DATE) - INTERVAL 1 DAY)AS DATETIME) AND moi.add_time <= CAST(CAST(SYSDATE()AS DATE)AS DATETIME) AND moi.question_status = 0 AND oi.got_status = 0 AND oi.sms_status = 0;

select count(1) FROM master_order_info moi, master_order_address_info moai, order_distribute oi, order_depot_ship ods WHERE moi.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn AND moi.master_order_sn = moai.master_order_sn AND ods.order_sn = oi.order_sn

select count(1) FROM( select count(1) FROM master_order_info moi, master_order_address_info moai, order_distribute oi, order_depot_ship ods, master_order_goods mog WHERE moi.master_order_sn = oi.master_order_sn AND moi.master_order_sn = moai.master_order_sn AND moi.master_order_sn = mog.master_order_sn AND ods.order_sn = oi.order_sn and ods.depot_code = mog.depot_code
GROUP BY moi.master_order_sn, mog.custom_code, mog.depot_code ) a
